name: VibrationFeedbackManager
summary: VibrationFeedbackManager is a simple util for call vibration feedback from your application. Make it easy.
description: VibrationFeedbackManager is a simple util for call vibration feedback to your user. You can select any feedback type for any feedback hardware type: 1. Old devices with default vibration hardware. 2. Taptic Engine v.1. for 6S/6S Plus and above 3. Taptic Engine v.2 (haptic feedback) for 7S / 7S Plus and above.
